src:
Bivši košarkaš Partizana u Španiji [FOTO]
07 Nov 2019, 17:05 by Milos
Strahinja Gavrilović ima novi klub.
Nekadašnji krilni centar Partizana prešao je u redove Breogana, saopštio je španski drugoligaš. Ugovor je, kako se navodi, privremen.



Gavrilović ima 25 godina, a četiri godine je proveo u SAD-u, na Univerzitetu „Južna Karolina“. Igrao je za Dinamik pre dolaska u Partizan, a veći deo prethodne i početak ove sezone proveo je u redovima čačanskog Borca.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Former Partizan basketball player in Spain [PHOTO]
07 Nov 2019, 16:05 by Milos
Strahinja Gavrilovic has a new club.
The former Partizan wing has moved into Breogan's ranks, the Spanish sophomore said. The contract is said to be temporary.



Gavrilovic is 25 years old and spent four years in the United States at the University of South Carolina. He played for Dynamik before coming to Partizan, and spent most of the previous and beginning of this season in the ranks of the Čačak fighter.
